alternate_name: INTEGRATIVE COUNSELING AND CONSULTING SERVICES, LLC
description:
Licensed Psychotherapist Eva Abad, provides counseling services for children, teens, adults, and the elderly. In-home therapy can be arranged for individuals with physical disabilities or the elderly.

* Depression and Anxiety disorders
* Trauma history/PTSD symptoms
* Grief and Elderly issues
* Women and Children issues
name: EVA ABAD, LMHC
